attributes.action: Allow retail workers, front line workers  to have COVID vaccine
attributes.additional_details: All retail staff and frontline workers deal with the general  public 24/7.  Retail staff have to put up with customers spitting and causing disruption  because they don't want to wear a nask, and the police have to put up with the same behaviour
attributes.background: Authorise COVID vaccine  for all retail workers and front line workers as soon as possible
